title: '11 BONNIE & CLYDE
body_text:
"WinterBall" Results and Statistics
Rimshot Contest
#15
: Winner ★ Lauren Stopa
→ Contestants: (14) Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kenny Jacobs, Justin Pierce, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Michael Edwards, Alysha Kelly, Juan Londono, Arthur Casbarro, Justin Wolf, former 1x winner John Tronolone, former 2x winners Chris Adams, Sara DeCuir, and Michael "Sputz" Krott, and Lauren Stopa.
→ This was a "Player's Choice" pregame which gave the champion booking power over "WinterBall" as well as become the inaugural
Championship Chase
champion.
Championship Chase
#4
: Winner ★ Justin Pierce
→ Title Holders: (5) Lauren Stopa
(G1, G2, G3)
, Justin Burdge
(G3, G4)
, Kevin Adams
(G4, G5)
, Brian Jones
(G5)
, and Justin Pierce
(G5, G6)
.
→ The mystery reward was the "Create-An-Event" prize package to be used at a future
ECD
presentation.
Attendance
: 26, comprised of 20 men and 6 women.
New Dodgeballers
: (3) Brian Jones, CJ Jones, and Justin Burdge
→ In an
ECD
rarity, the attendance figures for "WinterBall" - male, female, new, overall - completely mirrored its predecessor, "Wall Brawl", in November 2010.
Game-By-Game Rules
: Classic two-team.
Featured Match
: The UN'STOPA'BLEs defeated The UNTOUCHABLES, 5 - 1.
Game-By-Game Results
: UN'STOPA'BLEs 1, 2, 4-6; UNTOUCHABLES 3
Musical Playlist
: Michael "Sputz" Krott
________________________________________
___________
Excellence Awards 2010
ONLINE EXCLUSIVE!
Appreciation Award
★ Jon Yochum .. creation and construction of the current regeneration targets
★ Lauren Stopa .. new dodgeballs purchased over the past year
Deflection Defense Award
★ Justin Wolf
Light and Agile "L.A." Dodger Award
★ Ryan Rafferty
Perfect Attendance Award
★ Chris Adams
(4)
★ Diana DiBuccio
(5)
★ Joanice Lima
★ John Tronolone
(2)
★ Jon Yochum
(2)
★ Kevin Megill
(5)
★ Sascha Basista
(2)
→ Both DiBuccio and Megill have set a new record for most
Excellence Awards
with 5 each.
________________________________________
___________
Next Event
: Saturday, March 26, 2011, at 3pm. Event subtitle TBD.
body_html:
"WinterBall" Results and Statistics

Rimshot Contest #15: Winner ★ Lauren Stopa
→ Contestants: (14) Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kenny Jacobs, Justin Pierce, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Michael Edwards, Alysha Kelly, Juan Londono, Arthur Casbarro, Justin Wolf, former 1x winner John Tronolone, former 2x winners Chris Adams, Sara DeCuir, and Michael "Sputz" Krott, and Lauren Stopa.
→ This was a "Player's Choice" pregame which gave the champion booking power over "WinterBall" as well as become the inaugural Championship Chase champion.

Championship Chase #4: Winner ★ Justin Pierce
→ Title Holders: (5) Lauren Stopa (G1, G2, G3), Justin Burdge (G3, G4), Kevin Adams (G4, G5), Brian Jones (G5), and Justin Pierce (G5, G6).
→ The mystery reward was the "Create-An-Event" prize package to be used at a future ECD presentation.

Attendance: 26, comprised of 20 men and 6 women.
New Dodgeballers: (3) Brian Jones, CJ Jones, and Justin Burdge
→ In an ECD rarity, the attendance figures for "WinterBall" - male, female, new, overall - completely mirrored its predecessor, "Wall Brawl", in November 2010.

Game-By-Game Rules: Classic two-team.
Featured Match: The UN'STOPA'BLEs defeated The UNTOUCHABLES, 5 - 1.
Game-By-Game Results: UN'STOPA'BLEs 1, 2, 4-6; UNTOUCHABLES 3

Musical Playlist: Michael "Sputz" Krott
___________________________________________________

Excellence Awards 2010
ONLINE EXCLUSIVE!

Appreciation Award
★ Jon Yochum .. creation and construction of the current regeneration targets
★ Lauren Stopa .. new dodgeballs purchased over the past year

Deflection Defense Award
★ Justin Wolf

Light and Agile "L.A." Dodger Award
★ Ryan Rafferty

Perfect Attendance Award
★ Chris Adams(4)
★ Diana DiBuccio(5)
★ Joanice Lima
★ John Tronolone(2)
★ Jon Yochum(2)
★ Kevin Megill(5)
★ Sascha Basista(2)
→ Both DiBuccio and Megill have set a new record for most Excellence Awards with 5 each.

___________________________________________________

Next Event: Saturday, March 26, 2011, at 3pm. Event subtitle TBD.
